item.title: Jammes Hollis: A Summons to a Deeper Life
item.description: src Psyche - greek for “soul” Who am I? Knock of the door. Initiary moment to question. Deeper voice within us. In the long run tells us what’s right for us. Not the ego. Escaping the dictate of the time and place. Right place, right attitude, right neighborhood, right career. Five stages. Kuba Ross. Denial, anger, bargaining, despair, acceptance. Living an authentic life. Escaping the programming. So much of our life is routinized and patterns.
